CustomField.description: March 2015 ROI NCOA Status Flag July 2015 Melissa Data NCOA Status Flag
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
ROI: V = Verified N = Null (no match flag) M = Multi-Match
Melissa Data: 1 = Moved - new address now on file 2 = Moved but not exact match - new address now on file 3 = Validated Address 7 = Invalid Address
CustomField.label: NCOA Status Flag
